dcterms:description: Town and village-level crude birth rates in the Kinki region in 1935 and 1947, used to explore the indirect effects of war damage on fertility rates.
dcterms:title: Kinki region town/village data (1935 and 1947)

dcterms:creator: Economic Stabilization Board
dcterms:description: Comprehensive report on the damage caused by the Pacific War in Japan, providing air raid damage information for cities during WWII.
dcterms:title: Air raid damage information for cities during WWII

dcterms:creator: Statistics Bureau of the Cabinet
dcterms:description: Population census data providing demographic information for Japan, specifically the prefecture part of the 1935 census.
dcterms:title: Population Census of Japan (Statistics Bureau of the Cabinet)

dcterms:creator: Statistics Bureau of the Cabinet
dcterms:description: Vital statistics data providing information on births and deaths in Japan, specifically the 1947 edition.
dcterms:title: Vital Statistics of Japan by Municipalities

dcterms:creator: United States Strategic Bombing Survey
dcterms:description: Records of the U.S. Strategic Bombing Survey detailing the bombing campaigns and their impacts during WWII.
dcterms:title: United States Strategic Bombing Survey

dcterms:creator: Association of War-Devastated Cities
dcterms:description: A historical account of war reconstruction and the activities of the Association of War-Devastated Cities.
dcterms:title: Association of War-Devastated Cities
